A LITTLE ABOUT ME

Currently contracting as a Senior Software Developer for Oppenheimer Funds in Centennial, CO.

I am a front end software developer based out of Denver, CO. Jumping into the Wayback Machine... I started off in early 2000 as a fine artist and abstract painter. I quickly began pursuing a career in Graphic Design focusing on the basics of color theory, layout, typography and more. This built the foundation for what was to become my true passion, UI/UX and Front End Development.



Fast forward to present day, I now have over 10 years of hands-on real world experience in UI/UX design, rapid prototyping and front-end development. I have created websites and applications for a wide range of industries ranging from apparel to health care to the financial industry. I practice user focused design principles basing all my decisions on user driven needs and ultimately the goals of the business. I build mobile first, responsive software backed by clean semantic code that always focuses on speed and flexibilty.

In 2005 I opened a small freelance development business in Denver, XIRI Media. Through this company I entertain small and large contracts for businesses around Denver and the US. In the little spare time I have... I develop personal software/app ideas and open source projects.

Aside from all the work stuff, and most importantly in my life... I am a father of two beautiful and healthy girls that keep me on my toes and my life balanced. I love spending every free moment with them reading, playing a game on XBOX/PS4, watching some Doctor Who, or just chilling out and drawing or painting. I have also been teaching them HTML/SASS and they are learning it at about 10x the speed I learned... ahhh... to be young again.

How I work

  • 2.7GHz MacBook Pro (Retina, 15-inch, Mid 2012) with 16GB RAM and 500GB SSD - running Yosemite GM
  • Sublime Text is my IDE of choice although I have been dabbling in VIM
  • Chrome and Chrome Dev tools for troubleshooting and testing
  • Wireframes with Adobe Illustrator or AXURE/Balsamiq
  • Code in HTML5 or HAML
  • Style with SASS/CSS3 and my custom framework Potion
  • Sprinkle in Javascript/jQuery
  • Gulp.js for task running and the build process

About this site

  • Built on Jekyll - the open source static site generator
  • Built in SASS
  • Built with my custom SASS framework Potion
  • Task running and compiling done with Gulp.js
  • Google Page Speed of 91 for Desktop and 89 for Mobile
  • Posts are written in markdown
